meanings.definition: The state or quality of being bulky or large in size.
meanings.sent1: The bulkage of the package made it difficult to carry.
meanings.sent2: The bulkage of the furniture filled the room completely.
meanings.sent3: The bulkage of the elephant in the tiny car was quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: The bulkage of emotions in her heart was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The bulkage of the mountain against the sky was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The act of increasing in size or volume.
meanings.sent1: The bulkage of the dough as it rose was fascinating to watch.
meanings.sent2: The bulkage of the balloon was quick as air was pumped into it.
meanings.sent3: The bulkage of the cake in the oven was like a magic trick!
meanings.sent4: The bulkage of the crowd as they entered the stadium was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The bulkage of the river after the heavy rain was astonishing.

meanings.definition: The amount by which something is increased in size or volume.
meanings.sent1: The bulkage of the shipment was unexpected but welcome.
meanings.sent2: The bulkage of the plant after watering was noticeable.
meanings.sent3: The bulkage of the ice cream scoop was more than he could handle!
meanings.sent4: The bulkage of knowledge in his mind was vast and deep.
meanings.sent5: The bulkage of the clouds before the storm was ominous.
